content.2794460/f Sebastian 500/p Sebastian: Hospital_Ambient/-1000 -1000/farmer 1 1 2 Sebastian 9 4 3 Robin -100 -100 2/skippable/doAction 1 3/removeTile 1 3 Buildings/removeTile 1 2 Front/playSound keyboardTyping/showFrame Sebastian 24/animate Sebastian false true 100 26 27 26 27 26 27 26/viewport 6 6 true/move farmer 0 4 1/move farmer 5 0 1/pause 1000/speak Sebastian "哦，嗨。稍等一下。"/pause 500/playSound keyboardTyping/pause 1000/question fork1 "#他很忙……我还是走吧。#待在原地。"/fork didntLeave/move farmer -2 0 3/speak Sebastian "你要去哪儿？$u"/pause 300/faceDirection farmer 1/stopAnimation Sebastian/speak Sebastian "抱歉……我得在思路被打断之前，把这一行搞定。"/pause 500/move farmer 2 0 1/switchEvent sebastianRoom
content.didntLeave: pause 5500/stopAnimation Sebastian/speak Sebastian "好吧。真是抱歉，我要先把手头的事情搞定。"/switchEvent sebastianRoom
content.sebastianRoom: resetVariable/move farmer 0 2 1/playSound mouseClick/move farmer 3 0 0/playSound mouseClick/move farmer 0 -1 0/playSound mouseClick/move farmer 0 -1 0/pause 500/faceDirection farmer 0/question fork1 "#问问他刚刚在干什么。#称赞他房间的装饰。"/fork decor/pause 500/stopAnimation Sebastian/speak Sebastian "我有时候会接一些编程的零活。"/switchEvent enterRobin
content.decor: pause 500/stopAnimation Sebastian/speak Sebastian "装饰？哦，对哦……谢谢了。我在墙上贴海报已经贴好多年了。确实有点乱呢。"/switchEvent enterRobin
content.enterRobin: pause 500/playSound mouseClick/pause 100/playSound mouseClick/pause 500/playSound Pickup_Coin15/pause 300/emote Sebastian 40/speak Sebastian "是山姆的短信……看来他是想找我出去玩……#$b#呃，我今天不太想出门。$u"/pause 500/playSound doorClose/warp Robin 1 1/move Robin 0 4 1/speak Robin "啊，你好！@。"/faceDirection farmer 3/move Robin 4 0 1/speak Robin "我知道你不想让我进来……但我今天遇到了阿比盖尔，她说她在找你。"/pause 200/emote Sebastian 28/speak Sebastian "你有没有和她说我在工作？"/speak Robin "说了……不过她说她可能还是要来。"/emote Sebastian 12/speak Sebastian "*唉*……大家都不把我的工作当回事儿。$u#$b#玛鲁在诊所工作的时候就没人去打扰她……难道大家以为我整天就是在网上闲逛吗？"/faceDirection farmer 0 true/move Robin -4 0 0/move Robin 0 -4 0/warp Robin -100 -100/playSound doorClose/pause 500/faceDirection farmer 0/resetVariable/question fork1 "#问问他的工作目标。#问问他为什么不想见到朋友。"/fork noFriends/pause 500/speak Sebastian "嗯，我是想攒钱搬家。搬到城里什么的。"/emote Sebastian 40/speak Sebastian "我要是上了大学，现在怎么也赚到六位数了……但我并不想进入企业，过什么勾心斗角的日子，你懂吧？#$b#看来，与其让我和人面对面相处，还是躲藏在屏幕后面要舒服得多啊。$s"/emote Sebastian 28/pause 600/playSound mouseClick/pause 100/playSound mouseClick/pause 300/speak Sebastian "我得继续工作了……明天之前要把这个模块完成才行。"/animate Sebastian false true 100 24 24 24 24 24 24 24 24 24 24 25 26 27 26 27 26 27 26 25 24 24/playSound keyboardTyping/pause 500/move farmer 0 2 3/move farmer -3 0 0/move farmer 0 -2 3/move farmer -5 0 0 true/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 1000/end
content.noFriends: pause 500/emote Sebastian 28/speak Sebastian "*唉*……我喜欢交朋友，但也需要许多时间来独处。$s#$b#山姆则正好相反……一个人待太久，会让他发疯的。#$b#也许正是因为这个，我才如此喜欢电脑……电脑充满魅力，直截了当，又很无私。在我认识的人里面，没几个有这样的品格。"/pause 600/playSound mouseClick/pause 100/playSound mouseClick/pause 300/emote Sebastian 40/speak Sebastian "我得继续工作了……明天之前要把这个模块完成才行。"/pause 300/animate Sebastian false true 100 26 27/playSound keyboardTyping/pause 500/move farmer 0 2 3/move farmer -3 0 0/move farmer 0 -2 3/move farmer -5 0 0 true/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 1000/end
content.27/f Sebastian 1500/p Sebastian: jaunty/-1000 -1000/farmer 1 1 2 Sebastian 5 9 3 Sam 3 7 2/skippable/showFrame Sam 24/showFrame Sebastian 28/doAction 1 3/viewport 5 5 true/move farmer 0 6 1/pause 500/showFrame Sebastian 29/pause 500/speak Sebastian "嘿，@。$7"/pause 500/speak Sebastian "山姆和我正打算玩“索拉里昂英雄传奇：游戏版”……要不要加入我们？三个人一起更好玩。$7"/move farmer 0 1 2/pause 500/playSound thudStep/faceDirection farmer 1 true/showFrame 117/positionOffset farmer 16 80/pause 600/speak Sebastian "好，开始了……让我来抽取一张情景卡。$7"/pause 900/showFrame Sebastian 30/playSound dwoop/pause 500/showFrame Sebastian 28/pause 500/speak Sebastian "唔……看来今天的任务是进入死灵法师之塔……从恐怖领主萨尔斯的手中夺回索拉里昂法杖。"/pause 600/speak Sam "好……@，可以选择你的角色了吗？"/pause 500/question chooseCharacter "选择你的角色：#战士。我喜欢直截了当。#牧师。我喜欢帮助他人。#法师。唯有敏锐的头脑才是最锋利的武器。"/pause 500/speak Sebastian "嘿！我本来还想选这个呢！$h#$b#看来我只好当牧师了。"/pause 500/speak Sam "好啊。反正我最喜欢战士了。"/addMailReceived choseWizard/switchEvent opening
content.warrior: pause 500/speak Sebastian "真是明智的选择。新手最适合玩战士了。$7#$b#那我就选法师好了。"/emote Sam 28/speak Sam "那我只好选牧师了。$s"/addMailReceived choseWarrior/switchEvent opening
content.healer: pause 500/speak Sebastian "牧师吗？那可是个很重要的角色啊。$7#$b#那我就选法师好了。"/speak Sam "好啊。反正我最喜欢战士了。"/addMailReceived choseHealer/switchEvent opening
content.opening: pause 500/speak Sebastian "我们开始吧……"/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/playMusic Crystal Bells/cutscene boardGame/pause 1700/message "国王派你和你的同伴前去取回索拉里昂法杖……如果能够成功，你们的大名将流芳百世，还会获得数不完花不尽的金银财宝。"/pause 800/message "经过一个月的长途跋涉后，你登上了一座悬崖，隐约发现你的目标就坐落在前方。"/pause 100/message "在那月光照耀的平原对面，就是死灵法师塔……在塔里，恐怖领主萨尔斯正从他偷来的索拉里昂法杖中汲取能量，以实现自己邪恶的计划。"/pause 500/pause 700/updateMinigame 1/resetVariable/pause 700/question fork1 "塔就矗立在你的面前。#从正门进入。不入虎穴焉得虎子。#寻找后门，以免打草惊蛇。"/fork backEntrance/pause 500/updateMinigame 3/pause 50/playSound skeletonStep/pause 100/playMusic bigDrums/pause 500/message "一个骷髅拦住了你的去路。它似乎很难对付。"/pause 900/resetVariable/question fork1 "你要怎么办？#与骷髅对战。#逃跑。"/fork ranAway/pause 500/resetVariable/question fork0 "骷髅冲了过来！#挥动武器。#举起盾牌。"/fork swungWeapons/pause 600/playSound clubhit/updateMinigame -1/pause 500/message "你成功挡下了攻击。骷髅向后倒退了几步，你趁机冲上去，一击了结了这可怕的生物。"/pause 200/playSound swordswipe/pause 400/playSound skeletonDie/updateMinigame 5/updateMinigame -1/pause 1000/addMailReceived killedSkeleton/message "你小心翼翼地绕开骷髅的遗骸，沿着过道继续前进。"/pause 900/switchEvent sewer
content.swungWeapons: pause 300/message "骷髅的行动太快，你的队友们还没来得及发动进攻，就已经中招了！"/playSound killAnimal/updateMinigame -1/pause 1000/message "巨大的力量将你和你的同伴向后抛去。你们立足不稳，滚下了一道陡峭的斜坡，掉进了一个湿乎乎的地方。"/pause 100/playSound dropItemInWater/pause 700/switchEvent sewer
content.ranAway: pause 300/message "你沿着昏暗的走廊左绕右转。冰冷的石头旋转着向下延伸，仿佛无穷无尽。终于，你进入了一片新的区域。"/pause 400/switchEvent sewer
content.backEntrance: pause 300/playSound leafrustle/pause 500/playSound grassyStep/pause 400/playSound leafrustle/pause 500/updateMinigame 2/pause 600/message "在塔基附近搜索了一番之后，你在灌木丛中发现了一道木板暗门。下面是一架梯子，你和同伴走了下去。"/pause 800/playSound woodyStep/pause 400/playSound woodyStep/pause 400/playSound woodyStep/pause 500/switchEvent sewer
content.sewer: updateMinigame 4/resetVariable/playMusic pool_ambient/pause 1600/message "你发现自己身处一个类似下水道的地方。左手边，一条通道散发着奇异的绿色光芒。右手边，一段楼梯升入黑暗之中。"/pause 500/question fork1 "你要怎么办？#进入左侧的通道。#登上右侧的楼梯。"/fork wizardDoor/switchEvent podRoom
content.podRoom: pause 500/updateMinigame 7/resetVariable/playMusic Hospital_Ambient/pause 1600/message "你站在一个房间里。左手边有一架梯子。右手边有三个囚犯悬浮在诡异的发光容器里。他们似乎正在接受某种改造。"/pause 500/message "这难道就是恐怖领主的邪恶实验吗？"/pause 500/question fork0 "你要怎么办？#尽快离开。#摧毁容器。"/fork leave/pause 500/pause 500/playSound swordswipe/pause 200/playSound breakingGlass/updateMinigame -1/pause 1000/message "在让这些可怜的灵魂安息之后，你和同伴爬上了梯子。"/pause 800/addMailReceived destroyedPods/playSound woodyStep/pause 400/playSound woodyStep/pause 400/playSound woodyStep/pause 500/switchEvent wizardDoor
content.wizardDoor: pause 500/updateMinigame 8/resetVariable/playMusic Lava_Ambient/pause 1600/message "在通道尽头，一扇门出现在你们面前。"/pause 800/message "是时候面对恐怖领主萨尔斯了。"/pause 500/playSound openChest/pause 1000/switchEvent Necromancer
content.Necromancer: pause 500/updateMinigame 6/resetVariable/playMusic Lava_Ambient/pause 1600/message "萨尔斯：入侵者？你们竟敢闯入我的住所！"/pause 800/message "啊，原来你们是为了索拉里昂法杖而来……"/pause 800/message "嘿嘿嘿……真是愚蠢。你们很快就会加入我的骷髅大军！"/pause 500/fork choseWizard finalBossWizard/fork choseWarrior finalBossWarrior/message "恐怖领主萨尔斯射出暗影光线！"/pause 500/playSound flameSpell/pause 800/playSound flameSpellHit/updateMinigame -1/pause 1000/message "你躲开了法术，但你的同伴却受了重伤！"/pause 500/question fork0 "你要怎么办？#治疗战士（山姆）。#治疗法师（塞巴斯蒂安）。"/pause 500/fork healedSam/playSound healSound/pause 500/speak Sebastian "非常感谢，@。$7"/speak Sam "……$s"/pause 1000/playMusic none/message "塞巴斯蒂安放出“净化之箭”……一道白光径直击中了萨尔斯的脸。恐怖领主尖叫着化为了灰烬。"/playSound debuffSpell/pause 500/playSound killAnimal/updateMinigame 9/updateMinigame -1/pause 800/message "你捡起了索拉里昂法杖，将其高高举起，世界恢复了秩序！"/addMailReceived savedFriends/pause 1000/playSound getNewSpecialItem/updateMinigame -2/switchEvent end
content.healedSam: playSound healSound/pause 500/speak Sam "非常感谢，@。"/speak Sebastian "……$s"/pause 1000/playMusic none/message "山姆冲上去砍倒了萨尔斯，将索拉里昂法杖从他手中夺回，和平与秩序重返人间。"/pause 500/playSound swordswipe/pause 400/playSound killAnimal/updateMinigame 9/updateMinigame -1/pause 1000/playSound getNewSpecialItem/updateMinigame -2/switchEvent end
content.finalBossWizard: pause 500/resetVariable/message "恐怖领主萨尔斯在低声吟诵咒语……"/pause 500/question fork0 "你要怎么办？#对萨尔斯施放“净化光束”。#为同伴施放“护盾术”。"/fork castBeam/pause 800/playSound debuffHit/message "你给山姆和塞巴斯蒂安施加了“护盾术”。"/pause 500/playSound debuffSpell/updateMinigame -1/pause 1000/message "萨尔斯射出数道黑暗能量。其中一道击中了塞巴斯蒂安，却被你的“护盾术”弹回，打中了他自己的脸！"/pause 800/playSound killAnimal/updateMinigame 9/updateMinigame -1/pause 800/message "萨尔斯被击败了，索拉里昂法杖散发着柔和的光芒。世界恢复了秩序！"/pause 1000/playSound getNewSpecialItem/addMailReceived savedFriends/updateMinigame -2/switchEvent end
content.castBeam: pause 500/message "你还没来得及施展法术，萨尔斯就对你的同伴射出了一道暗影光束！"/pause 500/playSound flameSpell/pause 500/playSound flameSpellHit/updateMinigame -1/pause 800/message "山姆和塞巴斯蒂安被烧成了焦炭……"/pause 500/playSound yoba/pause 800/message "你的法术正中萨尔斯的面门。"/pause 500/playSound killAnimal/updateMinigame 9/updateMinigame -1/message "他尖叫着化为了灰烬。你捡起了索拉里昂法杖，将其高高举起，秩序与和平重返人间。"/pause 1000/playSound getNewSpecialItem/updateMinigame -2/switchEvent end
content.chargeAhead: pause 500/message "你向前冲去，但萨尔斯却绕过了你，对你的同伴施放了暗影光束！"/pause 500/playSound flameSpell/pause 500/playSound flameSpellHit/updateMinigame -1/pause 800/message "山姆和塞巴斯蒂安被烧成了焦炭……"/pause 800/message "你再次挥起利剑，结结实实地击中了萨尔斯，他尖叫着化为了灰烬。"/playSound swordswipe/pause 400/playSound killAnimal/updateMinigame 9/updateMinigame -1/pause 800/message "你捡起了索拉里昂法杖，将其高高举起。秩序与和平重返人间。"/pause 1000/playSound getNewSpecialItem/updateMinigame -2/switchEvent end
content.finalBossWarrior: pause 500/resetVariable/message "恐怖领主萨尔斯在低声吟诵咒语……"/pause 500/question fork0 "你要怎么办？#挥舞着长剑冲上去。#用你的盾保护同伴。"/fork chargeAhead/pause 1200/message "萨尔斯对塞巴斯蒂安施放了“暗影箭”……但你及时举起了盾牌，弹开了攻击！"/pause 500/playSound debuffSpell/pause 400/playSound parry/updateMinigame -1/pause 1000/message "在萨尔斯准备再次施法的间隙，你挥着剑冲上去，了结了他"/playSound swordswipe/pause 500/playSound killAnimal/updateMinigame 9/updateMinigame -1/pause 1000/message "索拉里昂法杖在你高举的手中散发着柔和的光芒。世界恢复了秩序！"/pause 1000/playSound getNewSpecialItem/addMailReceived savedFriends/updateMinigame -2/switchEvent end
content.leave: pause 500/message "将可怕的囚徒影像抛诸脑后，你和同伴飞快地爬上了梯子。"/pause 800/playSound woodyStep/pause 400/playSound woodyStep/pause 400/playSound woodyStep/pause 500/switchEvent wizardDoor
content.end: playMusic Hospital_Ambient/pause 9000/viewport 5 5 true/pause 800/showFrame Sebastian 29/speak Sebastian "嘿，不错！$7#$b#我用了三四回才通过第一幕呢。$7"/emote farmer 32/pause 1000/speak Sebastian "多谢拜访……回头见啦。$7"/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 1000/end
